website_summaries.verdict: The game of golf is special for many. While it may be relaxing because of the greenery, it poses different demands that can throw one’s performance off. Comfortable, waterproof, stable are the qualities that strike most with golfers. Besides that, it is also wrapped in a sleek package.
pros: The Ecco BIOM G 3 is regarded as extremely comfortable by a great number of users
The Gore-Tex feature is highly lauded by numerous owners
It keeps the water from entering the interior despite a heavy downpour or snow
Some of the commenters are surprised with the stability that this spiked shoe gives
These shoes create an excellent connection with the ground that helps golfers set up their stance easily
A few individuals are pleased with the quality of these Ecco golf shoes
The BIOM G 3 possesses impeccable quality, according to a number of commenters
A small number of golfers single out the upper of the shoe for being soft and flexible
It also has a sleek appearance that would be appreciated by mature players
cons: A small percentage of testers find the material a bit stiff for their liking
A break-in is necessary to soften it
One says that the arch falls a bit high and requires some getting used to at first

customer_reviews.title: Light and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of BIOM shoes, with the spikes. I normally wear size 10 American-made shoes, but I've found that Ecco's 9-9.5 (43) size fits me perfectly, not too tight at all, no binding or pinching and surprisingly the right length. Most importantly they securely hold my feet in the shoes, no jostling around inside during my overly violent swing. I'm going to try and be more careful when changing the spikes on this pair, as that was the death of my previous pair. Something about the Texas heat must weld golf spikes in - they're always a witch (with a b) to change out, no matter what brand of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RODNEY K

customer_reviews.title: Ecco Golf Shoes...... Niiiiiice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair on Amazon after returning a pair from another site that I had purchased for approximately $100 more. I was worried that the product might not be the same but it was exactly the same and was NIB. I’m a 10 1/2 and I ordered a size 44 which was supposed to fit 10 - 10 1/2. Fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Matre

customer_reviews.title: Promised myself to get Ecco again.
customer_reviews.text: Had a few pair of Ecco golf shoes about 15 years ago. They were great then and I'm not disappointed with my new Eccos! Have had a few pair of Adidas. Their lace ups are pretty good but I'm dissapointed by the Boa system. Mizuno (Boa) is a great shoe at about the same price point as the Ecco. If you're looking for a comfortable shoe at a cheaper price point, try True. They're a little more expensive than other shoes, but their roomy toe box makes them comfortable out of the box. Etonic and Adidas needed a few rounds before they 'fit'.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hokama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, runs large
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are very nice, the leather is supple and they look good, unlike most golf shoes. Just keep in mind they are about a full size bigger and order them accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable right out of the box. No blisters and no strain on the feet when walking the course.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I own three pairs of Ecco’s Sneakers and they are the most comfortable sneakers I own so I decided to try their golf shoes. Their golf shoes are no exception, they are very comfortable and fit great. Took about a couple of rounds to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: ET90

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Fit good and are very comfortable. I walk 18 twice a week and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Gorrell

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Eccos are extremely comfortable. Very durable shoes. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: No option for shoe width!
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this show back twice. I spoke to an amazon representative and ECCO has an option for shoe size but not an option for shoe width. The representative said that option doesn’t exist on this shoe. It would be helpful if Amazon could create a check list option for shoe width same as shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Hard work pays off

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I walk instead of riding in the cart. Great shoes very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LORRI LARKINS

customer_reviews.title: Help. I threw the box out and now I’m stuck
customer_reviews.text: How do I get rid of the extra width option? They are loose
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Ecco surpass all expectations again
customer_reviews.text: They fit like a glove.Best set of golf shoes I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Idris Rovers

customer_reviews.title: Get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Too wide for my narrow feet but not uncomfortably so.
customer_reviews.author: william poole

customer_reviews.title: spikes tear up the green
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable except I can feel the spikes through the insoles, doesn't feel good. Its almost impossible to move around the green without leaving major spike marks. I have 6 other pair of Ecco golf shoes, this is the only that's uncomfortable and leaves spike marks.
customer_reviews.author: JimBo

customer_reviews.title: They ate great
customer_reviews.text: They are a very light gray and looks great. My husband just love them and they are very confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: My feet are so comfortable Leather is good Sneakers that are as satisfying as I thought I would recommend them to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ecco golf shoes. I usually wear a 10 in all other brands but the 9/9.5 give me plenty of toe room and are not as wide as the 10/10.5. These are good for a walking-round ready right out of the box. As a comparison I also have a pair of Foot Joy Icon Black which are also very comfortable though not as great for walking 18.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler T

customer_reviews.title: Ecco makes the best golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: All I wear for golf are Ecco golf shoes. They are comfortable from day 1 and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Loose- Wide
customer_reviews.text: These definitely run big. 44 is supposed to be a men’s size11, but it’s closer to 11 1/2. In addition Ecco makes this style in Wide width only, so the shoe feels very loose. For $250+ you might consider other options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Biom G3 Golf Shoes
product_meta.description: The new BIOM G3 shoe showcases an evolution of comfort, style and innovation, utilising a range of industry-leading technologies to deliver exceptional performance that lasts round after round. GORE-TEX Waterproof technology combines optimised breathability & protection against the elements. Features: YAK leather uppers, extremely strong & lightweight for increased breathability and durability BIOM NATURAL MOTION technology brings the player closer to the ground using an anatomical last Champ Slim-Lok receptacle system and Zarma spikes offer reduced weight and easy replacement Removable comfort-fibre inlay sole for long-term cushioning and enhanced breathability
feature_bullets: BIOM NATURAL MOTION technology brings the player closer to the ground using an anatomical last
ZARMA-TOUR spikes traction. Hybrid elements, including the rotational line on toe and hybrid cleats
ECCO YAK leather uppers, extremely strong & lightweight for increased breathability and durability
Removable, washable, open-cell Ortholite inlay sole, long-term cushioning & enhanced breathability
GORE-TEX 100% waterproof technology combines optimised breathability & protection against elements
